resources.string: Marson is an second hand furniture shop located in Bazzar road Madipakkam Chennai-91. For the convenience of our customers we have developed a system where our customers can sell their old items online if we are interested then we ourselves will come and pickup the object and will pay a fair price for it. If your looking for any second hand furniture contact us. The following are the items we currently take.

string.name: things_list
